title: I don’t follow TikTok. Who is Addison Rae? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, Addison Rae is a TikTok Star/Influencer that has gained massive popularity within the end of 2019 and mostly 2020. She has a follower account on TikTok of (as of March 26th, 2020 3:54pm) 28.3 million and her account has received (from all her videos combined) at a massive 1.2 billion. She is also a part of “The Hype House” which features other major TikTok stars such a Charli (who has recently just become the most followed person on TikTok at 42 million as of March 26th, 2020 3:55pm.), Lil Huddy, Bryce Hall, Josh Richards, etc. Hope this helps!
Addison Rae is an American social media personality (tiktoker). She gained more than 2 billion views and 46 millions on tik tok and became the second most followed individual on tiktok.
